info.name: Royce Sofa 3S
info.LongDescription:
OVERVIEW
With the touch of a silver button, you can kick-back, snuggle up and enjoy a great book on the sink-in comfort of the Royce recliner. This tidy two-seat sofa is tailored in contemporary taupe leather and is ideal for smaller living areas.
Fine details such as blanket stitching on the armrests, high-quality thick, supple leather and padding along inside arms are excellent examples of the Royce’s top qualities. In fact, you wouldn’t be wrong in thinking that this first class recliner is not dissimilar to executive airline seating.
 
“As a sleek and contemporary family recliner, the Royce offers the ultimate in kickback style.” Freedom sofa buyer.
info.description:
Shown in Achira Leather in Taupe.

OVERVIEW
With the touch of a silver button, you can kick-back, snuggle up and enjoy a great book on the sink-in comfort of the Royce recliner. This tidy two-seat sofa is tailored in contemporary taupe leather and is ideal for smaller living areas.

Fine details such as blanket stitching on the armrests, high-quality thick, supple leather and padding along inside arms are excellent examples of the Royce’s top qualities. In fact, you wouldn’t be wrong in thinking that this first class recliner is not dissimilar to executive airline seating.
 
“As a sleek and contemporary family recliner, the Royce offers the ultimate in kickback style.” Freedom sofa buyer.
